ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccha.title: IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccines ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccha.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccines ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination-48
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#No meningococcal primary series dose was administered-122
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#One meningococcal primary series dose was administered-122
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago-105
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose.-148
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 years ago-105
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note-166
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccha.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccines ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccinesVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
